answers.answer: Hi,I have never heard of this as a symptom. but who knows....this should be mentioned to the pediatrician and he should be checked - for thyroid and also diabetes.  The dr would know what best to test.
Hi! My daughter is 9 and also born without a thyroid gland. I've never noticed bad breath of anykind. She has two older brothers who were born just fine, with a working thyroid gland!

question: My new grandson's breath smells like rubbing alcohol.   I worry because his older brother (age 3) was born with nothyroid.  Could this a symptom to have checked out?
title: newborn breath
